text:
Bram van der Vlugt (28 May 1934 – 19 December 2020) was a Dutch actor. He was born in The Hague. He was known for playing the role of Sinterklaas. He also starred in "Pastorale 1943", "Tropic of Emerald" and in "Family".
Van der Vlugt died on 19 December 2020 from COVID-19 in Utrecht, Netherlands at the age of 86.
